name: Alien Artifact
description:
You are Allen and your mission is to recover and analyze culturally significant artifacts in a distant solar system. Penetrate deep into Uranus and other planets to learn more about the ancient species that once colonized this sector. Remember we more interested in artifacts from culture not materials. 

Controls

Space/Left Mouse - Fire drill

Esc - Quit

Programming / Art - Jethro Richards

Art / Sound / UI - Mitchell Heath https://theoriginal201.itch.io/
